class.name: I128
class.description: Represents a 128-bit signed integer. This class provides methods for initialization from different types and conversion to other types.

method.name: from_variant
method.description: Creates a new [I128] instance from a [Variant]. The [Variant] can be an [int] or a [String] representing the integer.

method.name: get_int64
method.description: Returns the [I128] value as a 64-bit integer.

method.name: get_width
method.description: Returns the width of the integer in bits (128).

method.name: init_from_int
method.description: Initializes the [I128] instance from a 64-bit integer.

method.name: init_from_string
method.description: Initializes the [I128] instance from a string representation of the integer.

method.name: to_bytes
method.description: Converts the [I128] value to a [PackedByteArray] in big-endian format.

method.name: to_felt
method.description: Converts the [I128] value to a Starknet field element ([code]felt[/code]), which is returned as a [PackedByteArray].

method.name: to_float
method.description: Converts the [I128] value to a [float]. The [code]precision[/code] parameter specifies the number of decimal places.

method.name: to_string
method.description: Converts the [I128] value to its string representation.
